includedAssets.title: Deep Breath
includedAssets.synopsis: When the Doctor arrives in Victorian London he finds a dinosaur rampant in the Thames and a spate of deadly spontaneous combustions. Who is the new Doctor and will Clara's friendship survive as they embark on a terrifying mission into the heart of an alien conspiracy? The Doctor has changed. It's time you knew him.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The Doctor arrives in Victorian London to find a spate of deadly spontaneous combustions and a dinosaur rampant in the Thames.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: When the Doctor arrives in Victorian London he finds a dinosaur rampant in the Thames and a spate of deadly spontaneous combustions. Who is the new Doctor and will Clara's friendship survive as they embark on a terrifying mission into the heart of an alien conspiracy? The Doctor has changed. It's time you knew him.

includedAssets.title: Into The Dalek
includedAssets.synopsis: A Dalek fleet surrounds a lone rebel ship, and only the Doctor can help them now... With the Doctor facing his greatest enemy, he needs Clara by his side. Confronted with a decision that could change the Daleks forever he is forced to examine his conscience. Will he find the answer to the question, "am I a good man?"
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A Dalek fleet surrounds a rebel ship and only the Doctor can help, forcing him to examine his conscience and face down his greatest foe.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A Dalek fleet surrounds a lone rebel ship, and only the Doctor can help them now... With the Doctor facing his greatest enemy, he needs Clara by his side. Confronted with a decision that could change the Daleks forever he is forced to examine his conscience. Will he find the answer to the question, "am I a good man?"

includedAssets.title: Robot Of Sherwood
includedAssets.synopsis: In a sun dappled Sherwood forest, the Doctor discovers an evil plan from beyond the stars, and strikes up an unlikely alliance with Robin Hood. With all of Nottingham at stake, the Doctor must decide who is real and who is fake. Can impossible heroes actually exist?
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Deep in Sherwood forest, the Doctor discovers an evil plan from beyond the stars, and strikes up an unlikely alliance with Robin Hood.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: In a sun dappled Sherwood forest, the Doctor discovers an evil plan from beyond the stars, and strikes up an unlikely alliance with Robin Hood. With all of Nottingham at stake, the Doctor must decide who is real and who is fake. Can impossible heroes actually exist?

includedAssets.title: Listen
includedAssets.synopsis: What scares the Doctor? Ghosts of the past and future crowd into the lives of the Doctor and Clara, a terrified caretaker in a children's home, the last man standing in the universe, and a little boy who doesn't want to join the army. Listen!
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Ghosts crowd into the lives of the Doctor, Clara, a caretaker, the last man in the universe, and a little boy who doesn't want to join the army.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: What scares the Doctor? Ghosts of the past and future crowd into the lives of the Doctor and Clara, a terrified caretaker in a children's home, the last man standing in the universe, and a little boy who doesn't want to join the army. Listen!

includedAssets.title: Time Heist
includedAssets.synopsis: The Doctor turns bank robber when he is given a task he cannot refuse: steal from the most dangerous bank in the cosmos. With the help of a beautiful shape-shifter and cyber-augmented gamer, the Doctor and Clara must fight their way past deadly security and come face to face with the fearsome Teller, a creature of terrifying power that can detect guilt...
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The Doctor is given a task he cannot refuse: steal from the most dangerous bank in the cosmos.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The Doctor turns bank robber when he is given a task he cannot refuse: steal from the most dangerous bank in the cosmos. With the help of a beautiful shape-shifter and cyber-augmented gamer, the Doctor and Clara must fight their way past deadly security and come face to face with the fearsome Teller, a creature of terrifying power that can detect guilt...

includedAssets.title: The Caretaker
includedAssets.synopsis: When terrifying events threaten Coal Hill School, the Doctor decides to go undercover. The Skovox Blitzer is ready to destroy all humanity - and worse, any second now, Danny Pink and the Doctor are going to meet.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The Skovox Blitzer is ready to destroy humanity - and worse, any second now, Danny Pink and the Doctor are going to meet.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: When terrifying events threaten Coal Hill School, the Doctor decides to go undercover. The Skovox Blitzer is ready to destroy all humanity - and worse, any second now, Danny Pink and the Doctor are going to meet.

includedAssets.title: Kill The Moon
includedAssets.synopsis: In the near future, the Doctor and Clara find themselves on a space shuttle making a suicide mission to the moon. Crash-landing on the lunar surface, they find a mining base full of corpses, vicious spider-like creatures poised to attack, and a terrible dilemma. When Clara turns to the Doctor for help, she gets the shock of her life.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: In the near future, the Doctor and Clara find themselves on a space shuttle making a suicide mission to the moon.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: In the near future, the Doctor and Clara find themselves on a space shuttle making a suicide mission to the moon. Crash-landing on the lunar surface, they find a mining base full of corpses, vicious spider-like creatures poised to attack, and a terrible dilemma. When Clara turns to the Doctor for help, she gets the shock of her life.

includedAssets.title: Mummy On The Orient Express
includedAssets.altTitle: S8, Ep8 - Mummy On The Orient Express
includedAssets.synopsis: The Doctor is on the most beautiful train in history, speeding among the stars of the future. But a deadly creature is stalking the passengers. Once you see the horrifying mummy, you only have 66 seconds to...
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The Doctor speeds among the stars of the future on a beautiful train, while a deadly creature stalks the passengers.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The Doctor is on the most beautiful train in history, speeding among the stars of the future. But a deadly creature is stalking the passengers. Once you see the horrifying mummy, you only have 66 seconds to...

includedAssets.title: Flatline
includedAssets.synopsis: Separated from the Doctor, Clara discovers a new menace from another dimension. But how do you hide when even the walls are no protection? With people to save and the Doctor trapped, Clara goes against an enemy that exists beyond human perception.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Separated from the Doctor, Clara goes against an enemy that exists beyond human perception.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Separated from the Doctor, Clara discovers a new menace from another dimension. But how do you hide when even the walls are no protection? With people to save and the Doctor trapped, Clara goes against an enemy that exists beyond human perception.

includedAssets.title: Into The Forest Of The Night
includedAssets.altTitle: S8, Ep10 - Into The Forest Of The Night
includedAssets.synopsis: One morning in every city and town in the world, the human race wakes up to face the most surprising invasion yet. Everywhere, in every land, a forest has grown overnight and taken back the Earth. It doesn't take the Doctor long to discover that the final days of humanity have arrived.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As the human race wakes up to the most surprising invasion yet, the Doctor discovers that the final days of humanity have arrived.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: One morning in every city and town in the world, the human race wakes up to face the most surprising invasion yet. Everywhere, in every land, a forest has grown overnight and taken back the Earth. It doesn't take the Doctor long to discover that the final days of humanity have arrived.

includedAssets.title: Dark Water
includedAssets.synopsis: In the mysterious world of the Nethersphere, plans have been drawn. Missy is about to come face to face with the Doctor, and an impossible choice is looming... 'Death is not an end', promises the sinister organisation known only as 3W - but, as the Doctor and Clara discover, they might wish it was.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Missy is about to come face to face with the Doctor, and an impossible choice is looming.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: In the mysterious world of the Nethersphere, plans have been drawn. Missy is about to come face to face with the Doctor, and an impossible choice is looming... 'Death is not an end', promises the sinister organisation known only as 3W - but, as the Doctor and Clara discover, they might wish it was.

includedAssets.title: Death In Heaven
includedAssets.synopsis: With Cybermen on the streets of London, old friends unite against old enemies and the Doctor takes to the air in a startling new role. Can the mighty UNIT contain Missy? As the Doctor faces his greatest challenge, sacrifices must be made before the day is won.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: With Cybermen on the streets of London, old friends unite against old enemies and the Doctor takes to the air.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: With Cybermen on the streets of London, old friends unite against old enemies and the Doctor takes to the air in a startling new role. Can the mighty UNIT contain Missy? As the Doctor faces his greatest challenge, sacrifices must be made before the day is won.

includedAssets.title: Season 8
includedAssets.synopsis: Peter Capaldi debuts as the Twelfth Doctor alongside Jenna Coleman as Clara in 12 new adventures in space and time, beginning with a feature-length episode set in Victorian London.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Peter Capaldi debuts as the Twelfth Doctor alongside Jenna Coleman as Clara in 12 new adventures in space and time.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Peter Capaldi debuts as the Twelfth Doctor alongside Jenna Coleman as Clara in 12 new adventures in space and time, beginning with a feature-length episode set in Victorian London.

includedIn.title: Doctor Who
includedIn.shortSynopsis: The Doctor, an enigmatic Time Lord from the planet Gallifrey, travels through time and space on missions of discovery and adventure.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: The Doctor, an enigmatic Time Lord from the planet Gallifrey, travels through time and space on missions of discovery and adventure.
